{"id":1320270329,"question_id":3500,"lang":"python3","lang_name":"Python3","time":"1 week, 5 days","timestamp":1720925918,"status":11,"status_display":"Wrong Answer","runtime":"N/A","url":"/submissions/detail/1320270329/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Minimum Cost for Cutting Cake II","memory":"N/A","code":"class Solution:\n    def minimumCost(self, m: int, n: int, horizontalCut: List[int], verticalCut: List[int]) -> int:\n        horizontalCut.sort()\n        verticalCut.sort()\n        \n        def max_gap(length, cuts):\n            max_gap_val = cuts[0]\n            for i in range(1, len(cuts)):\n                max_gap_val = max(max_gap_val, cuts[i] - cuts[i-1])\n            return max(max_gap_val, length - cuts[-1])\n        \n        MOD = 10**9 + 7\n        max_h_gap = max_gap(m, horizontalCut)\n        max_v_gap = max_gap(n, verticalCut)\n        \n        return (max_h_gap * max_v_gap) % MOD","compare_result":"","title_slug":"minimum-cost-for-cutting-cake-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
